intro_only_event_multi_4_anniversary_log: Hmm...

What are your thoughts on the taste of the fake
Slowpoke tails my subordinates and I made?

The texture should be almost exactly like the
real thing!
Not terrible...but still not good enough.
Hmph!

You might be able to trick someone from
Kanto or Johto, but anyone from Alola wouldn’t
be fooled.

Slowpoke tails are used a lot in their home
cooking, so they’d know exactly what the real
thing tastes like.

Why don’t you smoke it to hide the flavor—like
they do in Galar?

An excellent idea from the master of
disguise himself!

You’re always researching how to make something
seem real.
Heh. Well yeah!

With your advice, I can finish making the fake
Slowpoke tails...

and then my evil money-making scheme is sure
to succeed!
Urgh, I’ve got such a headache.
The grunts keep failing, so Giovanni is angry.
Should we join them for this operation?

If all the executives attack at once, maybe things
will go our way?

If we step in now, then the overall quality of
Team Rocket is never going to get any better.

I trust the grunts to do what it takes to redeem
themselves this time.

What a surprise. I wouldn’t expect to hear the
word “trust” come out of your mouth.

Don’t tell me all the kids around here are getting
into your head?
How foolish!

We are Team Rocket... Our only connection is a
ruthless, evil bond!
The world is vast.

No matter how wide you stretch your arms, you’ll
never be able to grasp it all.
That’s why...I want it.
It’s me.
Fine, wait there.
It’s your turn to battle, Mewtwo.
You’ve been waiting for this moment, I assume?
*chuckle* Don’t worry.
As long as you cooperate, you’ll never get bored.

You’ll have plenty of opportunities to battle
strong opponents who think they can stop evil.
Let’s go.
And move one step closer to ruling the world!
